scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run htmlhint
scripts.meta:firefox: npm run meta && cp src/manifest.json.firefox build/manifest.json
scripts.meta:chrome: npm run meta && cp src/manifest.json.chrome  build/manifest.json
scripts.build:images: mkdir -p build/images && cp src/images/*png build/images && optipng --quiet build/images/*png
scripts.build: npm run build:images && npm run build:js
scripts.build:firefox: npm run meta:firefox && npm run build
scripts.build:chrome: npm run meta:chrome  && npm run build
scripts.zip: rm -f paperhive.zip && npm run build:chrome && cd build && zip -r ../paperhive.zip * && cd ..
scripts.xpi: rm -f paperhive.xpi && npm run build:firefox && cd build && zip -r ../paperhive.xpi * && cd ..
